parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Control Module (TCM) and Dual-Clutch Transmission (DCT) Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the TCM and DCT can cause unpredictable and unresponsive acceleration, jerking, shuddering, failure to shift, stalling, and complete loss of power, which can lead to traffic accidents.
symptoms: Unresponsive or sluggish acceleration
jerking
shuddering
failure to shift
stalling
complete loss of power
delayed brake release
and engine revving out of gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended shift into Sport mode can cause sudden acceleration, loss of control, and accidents, especially when the vehicle is in motion.
symptoms: The vehicle shifts from Drive mode into Sport mode without driver input
usually in low gear (first gear)
while in motion
and often when starting to move after being stopped.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake System Failure - Clicking Noise and Sluggish Pedal
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause a loss of braking performance, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: A clicking noise coming from the bottom of the engine when the brake pedal is depressed
the clicking noise may continue after the car has been parked and locked
the brake pedal feels sluggish with little resistance
a "Check Brake System" warning may appear on the dashboard display.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Vehicle Battery Failure - Depletion and Servicing/Replacement Needed
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A depleted vehicle battery can cause the vehicle to stall or become stranded, leading to inconvenience and potential safety risks.
symptoms: The vehicle battery is depleted and needs servicing or replacement
the vehicle may stall or become stranded.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent electrical system failure can cause safety issues, such as the Remote Keyless Entry (RKE) system failing, leaving the owner stranded, and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Intermittent failure of the air conditioning system
cluster settings malfunctioning
unprovoked beeps from the passenger door
RKE system failure
and engine failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission shifting issues can cause the vehicle to become stuck in park, making it difficult or impossible to operate the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle gets stuck in park
difficulty shifting gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The backup camera malfunction can cause reduced visibility, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries when reversing.
symptoms: Fuzzy or distorted backup camera display
even after cleaning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The infotainment system malfunction can cause distractions while driving, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Apple Car Play drops out
switches from current phone call
or malfunctions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The TPMS malfunction can cause reduced tire safety, increasing the risk of tire blowouts or accidents.
symptoms: The TPMS system fails to alert the driver when tire pressure is below 30lbs.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended acceleration of the vehicle while using cruise control can lead to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates uncontrollably when using cruise control
continues to accelerate despite attempts to cancel or adjust speed
and only stops accelerating when the brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system malfunction can cause various safety-critical systems to fail, leading to accidents, injuries, or even fatalities. The malfunction can also lead to theft and property damage.
symptoms: The LCD screen goes black
the steering wheel locks
the wipers and washer fluid turn on unexpectedly
the dashboard display (including speedometer) goes black
the door lock button gets stuck
and the window motor fails
leaving the window half down.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The paint and clear coat defect can lead to premature deterioration of the vehicle's exterior, reducing its appearance and resale value.
symptoms: The paint and clear coat separate
causing a white discoloration on the trunk.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The poor dealership service can lead to prolonged periods of vehicle downtime, causing inconvenience and financial loss to the owner.
symptoms: The dealership fails to resolve issues in a timely manner
offering inadequate compensation for the inconvenience.
